channel.title: Rs2-Toplist Project
channel.description:
[center][img]http://rs2-toplist.com/forum/images/forumlogo.png[/img][/center]
[center]Rs2-TopList will be a good way to advertise your server and to find new friends on our community:)[/center]
Features
- Add server - Control Panel - Toplist - Voting - Recently Posted - Anti-boots vote - Search Servers - Premium Servers - Voting CallBack - Status Checker - Bidding system - Advertise spots on home page - Auto subscribe ranks
Links:
- Home - [url=http://rs2-toplist.com]http://rs2-toplist.com[/url] - Forum - [url=http://rs2-toplist.com/forum]http://rs2-toplist.com/forum[/url] - TopList RS2 Toplist - [url=http://rs2-toplist.com/forum/toplist.php]http://rs2-toplist.com/forum/toplist.php[/url]
Few development pictures:
[img]http://i43.tinypic.com/5anr0x.png[/img] [img]http://i41.tinypic.com/2m4ojuc.png[/img] [img]http://i39.tinypic.com/9vi0b6.png[/img] [img]http://i62.tinypic.com/14xm1dl.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/4b976e48fdd77f4b49518708a088a576.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/732b7dd8f48414bd9f8e2cfc5a31720b.png[/img]
More comming soon:)
